title: xmlElemNew
name: xmlElemNew
description: Creates an XML document object element

arguments.name: xmlObj
arguments.description: Name of the XML document object in which you are creating the element

arguments.name: namespace_or_childName
arguments.description: URI of the namespace to which this element belongs or the name of the element to create.

arguments.name: childName
arguments.description: The name of the element to create. This element becomes a child element of xmlObj in the tree.
